post.body: *shakes fist*
Very cool! Let me know if you guys come up with ideas to improve on what I've proffered.
You should try the techniques in my slideshow! :-) I had a feeling that was why the editors put it on the front page. :-P
I suspected it might have to do with not using DVI. I'll stop being a cheap bastard and plunk down the 30 bucks for the DVI cable.
For the external display, are you sure? We drove 24" Dells at my old workplace no worries.
Don't forget the playing 4 full quarters part.
Wow, that is harsh. Next edition of dictionary will have the #Skins logo next to the definition of mediocre.
The #Skins are *so* 8-8. Not just by their record, but by their utter mediocrity, losing to SF, Cincy and St. Louis.
Humble pie? Nah...
Despite the hype after the 1st 8 games, the #Skins will end the season w/exactly the right record: 8-8
Weird. It's snappy-as for me.
New prediction: 34-14 #Skins #pastisprologue
Ah, slow search. I thought you just meant general site responsiveness. Anyway, I do my best thinking on vacation. :-P
It's just you. :-)
Uh... what free version? Looks like it starts at $24/month to me.
Anyone know if an early 2007 MacBook can drive an LG Flatron W2242T at full resolution, full width? Iz no worky for me.
I nominate http://lge.com for worst @#$%^&! corporate website ever in the history of corporate websites. @stinkyawards
Isn't it ironic that the only comments I've received on my SlideShare presentation on defeating comment spam are spam? http://tr.im/banspam
Maybe Miami should watch for the lateral on this next play. Just a thought.
Obama could unpardon Bush & cronies if it comes to that: http://tr.im/2p1x (via @indictbush)
